Page 2134
Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-054 Date: 7/24/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
0630am Im Epstein appears to be sleeping at this time, breakfast has arrived but has not been given to him as of yet (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
0645am Im Epstein appears to be sleeping (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
0700am I/c end of tour (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:00AM start the new shift Dw Rds Ops (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:15AM Im Epstein recive his breakfast and went back to Sleep and ask the L/T for his medication (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:30 AM Im Epstein appears to be Sleeping
7:35AM Im Epstein got up and he es hearing voices
7:40 AM Im Epstein ask for a Shower and I Cell the Lt (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:45AM Im Epstein steel eating his breakfast
8:00 AM Im Epstein is setting Slowon on his bed
8:15AM Im Epstein working the bathroom
8:20AM reviewed the log Book and Interviewed Im Epstein for psychology
8:30 AM still interviewing Im Epstein (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:45 AM stepped Im Epstein down from Suicide watch to Psychological Observation
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
7
DOJ-OGR-00025974

additional_notes: The document is a Suicide Watch Observation Log for inmate Epstein. The log contains handwritten entries detailing Epstein's activities and observations from 0630am to 8:45 AM on 7/24/19. The document has been redacted in several places, with (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) indicating the redaction of personal information.
